Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Viladomat in Barcelona (Eixample), you'll be convenient to Casa Golferichs and Casa Batllo. This hotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Sagrada Familia.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 81 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 81 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Hotel Viladomat in Barcelona (Eixample), you'll be convenient to Casa Golferichs and Casa Batllo. This hotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Sagrada Familia.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Casa Golferichs - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Hospital Clinic - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Joan Miro Park - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Placa d'Espanya - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Placa Universitat - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Sant Antoni Market - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
University of Barcelona - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Francesc Macia Plaza - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Francisco Godia Foundation - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Park of Industrial Spain - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Barcelona Museum of Contemporary Art - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Centre de Cultura Contemporania de Barcelona - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Fundacio Antoni Tapies - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Magic Fountain of Montjuic - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Bulevard Rosa - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Viladomat is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 11 km / 6.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Barcelona Tourist Tax applies, to be paid directly to the hotel upon check-in. Guests under the age of 16 are exempt. Tax rates apply per person, per night, for a maximum 7 nights, as follows: 5-star EUR 2.48; 4-star EUR 1.21; 1 to 3-star EUR 0.72. Applicable from 23/Feb/2015 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
